https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kptzmuY4PtZK4KC0B3G7YCQ50o8.jpg In this endearing tale of friendship, animals are helped by Bear to get ready for winter. But will they be awake long enough for him to tell his story? Bear Has a Story to Tell
